title: "Can a video game company tame toxic behaviour?" publicado en Nature

embed.description: It took less than a minute of playing League of Legends for a homophobic slur to pop up on my screen. Actually, I hadn't even started playing. It was my first attempt to join what many agree to be the world's leading online game, and I was slow to pick a character.

body:
Les comparto un interesante articulo publicado el 30/3/2016 en la revista Nature donde abarca y se hace análisis del comportamiento tóxico en LOL.

PD: Lamentablemente el articulo esta en ingles.

http://www.nature.com/news/can-a-video-game-company-tame-toxic-behaviour-1.19647

replies.body:
Para mi todo depende de la persona, yo era violento antes de jugar al LOL, y el LOL no me volvio violento denuevo no toxico ni nada de eso.

Hay gente nomas que no separa un video juego de la vida real. Y cree que una persona normal va a empezar a matar amigos solo porque lo hace en un juego.
Siempre han habido casos anteriores, bullying, ira, etc.

> It was my first attempt to join what many agree to be the world's leading online game, and I was slow to pick a character. The messages started to pour in.
“Pick one, kidd,” one nudged.
Then, “Choose FA GO TT.”
